aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: KMS Customer Managed Key that SHARR will use to encrypt data
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: /Solutions/SO0111/CMK_ARN

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: SNS Topic ARN where SHARR will send status messages. This        topic can be useful for driving additional actions, such as email notifications,        trouble ticket updates.
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: /Solutions/SO0111/SNS_Topic_ARN

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Flag to enable or disable sending anonymous metrics.
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: /Solutions/SO0111/sendAnonymousMetrics

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Solution version for metrics.
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: /Solutions/SO0111/version

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: SO0111 SHARR Common functions used by the solution
Lambda role to allow cross account read-only SHARR orchestrator functions
Checks the status of an SSM Automation Document in the target account
Determines if a manual approval is required for remediation
Executes an SSM Automation Document in a target account
Checks the status of an SSM automation document execution
Lambda role to perform notification and logging from orchestrator step function
Sends notifications and log messages
Lambda role to allow creation of Security Hub Custom Actions
Custom resource to create an action target in Security Hub

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Arn of the SHARR Orchestrator Step Function. This step function routes findings to remediation runbooks.
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: /Solutions/SO0111/OrchestratorArn

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Remediate with SHARR
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: Remediate_with_SHARR_CustomAction

Statement.Sid: Put bucket policy needed for audit logging

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: KMS Customer Managed Key that will encrypt data for remediations
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: /Solutions/SO0111/CMK_REMEDIATION_ARN

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Version of the AWS Security Hub Automated Response and Remediation solution
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: /Solutions/SO0111/member-version

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Parameter to store log group name
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: /Solutions/SO0111/Metrics_LogGroupName

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Parameter to store encryption key alias for the PCI.S3.4/AFSBP.S3.4, replace the default value with the KMS Key Alias, other wise the remediation will enable the default AES256 encryption for the bucket.
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: /Solutions/SO0111/afsbp/1.0.0/S3.4/KmsKeyAlias

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Parameter to store the S3 bucket name for the remediation AFSBP.REDSHIFT.4, the default value is bucket-name which has to be updated by the user before using the remediation.
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: /Solutions/SO0111/afsbp/1.0.0/REDSHIFT.4/S3BucketNameForAuditLogging
